segments.text: Kelly , the guys and I think you should run for senior class president .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me ? Why me ? Why not you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We talked to our older brothers and sisters last night and got the scoop on what that job is all about .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you think I fit the qualifications ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Did you know that the senior class president works for the class for life ? The job doesn't stop when we graduate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? What is there to do after we graduate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Every class reunion is organized by the president and council and anything our class does for the school in later years is headed by the president .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm honored that you think I would be qualified . But I would really have to think about this first .
segments.speaker: S2
